Package com.rbbn.cpaas.mobile.messaging.chat.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChangeAdminRoleCallback
    Generic callback methods to handle results from SDK operations.
    ChatConversation
    Interface to expose ChatConversation SDK methods
    ChatGroup
    Defines the interface of a chat group and provides properties of it.
    ChatGroupParticipant
    Defines the interface of a chat group participant and provides properties of it.
    ChatListener
    Represents chat events.
    ChatMessageStatusListener
    Generic callback methods to handle results from SDK operations.
    ChatService
    Interface to expose ChatService SDK methods
    DownloadCompleteListener
    Interface for download completion
    FetchAllParticipantsForGroupCallback
    Generic callback methods to handle results from SDK operations.
    FetchGroupCallback
    Generic callback methods to handle results from SDK operations.
    FetchGroupsCallback
    Generic callback methods to handle results from SDK operations.
    FetchParticipantForGroupCallback
    Generic callback methods to handle results from SDK operations.
    TransferProgressListener
    Interface for receiving file transfer progress updates
    TransferRequestHandle
    Interface for cancelling a file transfer request
    UpdateGroupCallback
    Generic callback methods to handle results from SDK operations.
    UploadCompleteListener
    Interface for upload completion
